de.ovgu.featureide.core.internal

Class FeatureProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.core.internal.BuilderMarkerHandler
      • de.ovgu.featureide.core.internal.FeatureProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBuilderMarkerHandler, IFeatureProject, java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener

    public class FeatureProject
extends BuilderMarkerHandler
implements IFeatureProject, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener
    Class that encapsulates any data and method related to FeatureIDE projects.
    Author:
    Marcus Leich, Thomas Thuem, Tom Brosch, Marcus Pinnecke (Feature Interface)

        public IComposerExtensionClass getComposer()
        Description copied from interface: IFeatureProject
        Gets the current composer.
        Specified by:
        getComposer in interface IFeatureProject
        Returns:
        The composer, specified for this project or null if the composerID is unknown
        - The composer is now a property of the project and not specified by the nature or builder (every project has the same nature and builder, which can be extended by other eclipse plug-ins)
